choices: You Decide To Fly Away In Panic
1.content:
The last thing you remember is getting hit by a car and seeing a big flash of light. You open yours eyes and see that your surrounded by mud and grass.

Your confused to what’s happening until you see your hand. You have transformed into a Fly.

You turn around and see a large tombstone that says “Jack RIP”.

You freak out until To you hear a large booming sound. Looks like someone is coming to pay their respects.
1.title: Turned Into A Fly

info.brief_description: You turn into a Fly And is stuck in a giant Unaware female family PLEASE ADD
info.description:
You are Jack and you have died and reincarnated as a Fly. Now you must get the attention of you giant family.

CHARACTERS:
1). Marisa (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0000673/mediaviewer/rm1019392000) - your wife

2). Millie (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm5611121/mediaviewer/rm4000929536) - your daughter

3). Sigourney (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0000244/mediaviewer/rm3026717184) - your mother and Marisa’sstep mother

4). Jennifer (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0000182/mediaviewer/rm545942528) - you and Marisa’s best friend

5). Chris (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm1165110/mediaviewer/rm1462919424) - the neighbor who won’t stop trying to get in Marisa’s pants

RULES:
1). Keep It Unaware (They Can’t Find Out That He Is Human)
2). Keep It Female Focues (Onless Is F/M Action)
3). Anything Sexual Goes, Go Crazy
4). Try To Describe What Their Wearing (Or Use Images)
